intent_atoms.description: Implement the hdlr parser to close out remaining Phase C backlog item referenced in MVP checklists and surface handler metadata alongside mdhd parser coverage.
The hdlr parser must integrate with BoxParserRegistry wiring so that streaming pipeline, CLI exports, and SwiftUI detail panes display handler metadata.
Handler metadata must be consistently available across all interfaces (streaming pipeline, CLI, SwiftUI).
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners are online.
Benchmarks should run on macOS with Instruments support and track fixtures and manifest revisions as documented.
Benchmark results must be reproducible and recorded in specified documentation files.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA once runners are available following the release readiness runbook.
All steps of the release readiness runbook must be completed and documented in the specified guides.
Execute random slice benchmark suite on macOS to compare mapped vs. chunked readers under identical workloads once Combine support is available.
Benchmark results should reflect comparable workloads and be recorded as per archival notes.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI support to validate end‑to‑end SwiftUI automation flow.
Test suite must run successfully on macOS and confirm that the automation flow works.
